001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.customer;
003
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009
010import com.commercetools.api.models.common.BaseAddress;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.customer_group.CustomerGroupResourceIdentifier;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.store.StoreResourceIdentifier;
013
014public interface CustomerDraftMixin {
015    public static CustomerDraftBuilder builder(Customer customer) {
016        List<BaseAddress> addresses = new ArrayList<>(customer.getAddresses());
017        Map<String, Integer> addressIds = java.util.stream.IntStream.range(0, addresses.size())
018                .boxed()
019                .collect(
020                    java.util.stream.Collectors.toMap(integer -> addresses.get(integer).getId(), Function.identity()));
021        return CustomerDraft.builder()
022                .key(customer.getKey())
023                .customerNumber(customer.getCustomerNumber())
024                .externalId(customer.getExternalId())
025                .email(customer.getEmail())
026                .firstName(customer.getFirstName())
027                .lastName(customer.getLastName())
028                .middleName(customer.getMiddleName())
029                .title(customer.getTitle())
030                .dateOfBirth(customer.getDateOfBirth())
031                .companyName(customer.getCompanyName())
032                .vatId(customer.getVatId())
033                .addresses(addresses.size() > 0 ? addresses : null)
034                .defaultBillingAddress(customer.getDefaultBillingAddressId() != null
035                        ? addressIds.get(customer.getDefaultBillingAddressId())
036                        : null)
037                .defaultShippingAddress(customer.getDefaultShippingAddressId() != null
038                        ? addressIds.get(customer.getDefaultShippingAddressId())
039                        : null)
040                .billingAddresses(customer.getBillingAddressIds().size() > 0 ? addressIds.entrySet()
041                        .stream()
042                        .filter(entry -> customer.getBillingAddressIds().contains(entry.getKey()))
043                        .map(Map.Entry::getValue)
044                        .collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toList()) : null)
045                .shippingAddresses(customer.getShippingAddressIds().size() > 0 ? addressIds.entrySet()
046                        .stream()
047                        .filter(entry -> customer.getShippingAddressIds().contains(entry.getKey()))
048                        .map(Map.Entry::getValue)
049                        .collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toList()) : null)
050                .isEmailVerified(customer.getIsEmailVerified())
051                .customerGroup(Optional.ofNullable(customer.getCustomerGroup())
052                        .map(reference -> CustomerGroupResourceIdentifier.builder().id(reference.getId()).build())
053                        .orElse(null))
054                .locale(customer.getLocale())
055                .salutation(customer.getSalutation())
056                .stores(Optional.ofNullable(customer.getStores())
057                        .map(stores -> stores.stream()
058                                .map(store -> StoreResourceIdentifier.builder().key(store.getKey()).build())
059                                .collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toList()))
060                        .orElse(null))
061                .authenticationMode(customer.getAuthenticationMode())
062                .custom(Optional.ofNullable(customer.getCustom())
063                        .map(com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields::toDraft)
064                        .orElse(null));
065    }
066}
